name: Maze Game (CoryScaffidi)
description:
You find and get trapped in a maze, you need to get out.

This is a game where you have to go through a maze and collect keys to get out. The game currently only has one level where you need to collect five keys. You can use either WASD or the arrow keys however the arrow keys won't make you character turn to the direction moving it will still move but it doesn't look as good.
